languages.text: "Видать, он решил, что я повторю ошибку, доверившись его слову. Нет. Тем более что пресмыкаться перед впавшим в немилость архонтом опаснее, чем возродить собственный кабал, вернув его предводителю уважение. Притвориться, что я следую приказам Назракея, было несложно — он заметно поглупел, проведя в реальном мире какое-то время. Сговориться с Маражаем через одного из незримых слуг на твоем корабле было чуть труднее... но не невозможно".

"He must have decided that I would repeat Marazhai's same mistake and trust him. I did not, and besides, grovelling before an Archon that has fallen into disfavour is even more dangerous than resurrecting a fallen Kabal. Pretending that I was carrying out Nazrakhei's orders was easy, he became noticeably more stupid after his time in realspace. Conspiring with Marazhai via one of the unseen servants on your ship was more challenging... but not impossible."
languages.original_text: "Видать, он решил, что я повторю ошибку, доверившись его слову. Нет. Тем более что пресмыкаться перед впавшим в немилость архонтом опаснее, чем возродить собственный кабал, вернув его предводителю уважение. Сговориться с Маражаем через одного из незримых слуг на твоем корабле было чуть труднее... но не невозможно".

Pretending that I was carrying out Nazrakhei's orders was easy, he became noticeably more stupid after his time in the realspace. Conspiring with Marazhai via one of the unseen servants on your ship was more challenging... But not impossible."

Conspiring with Marazhai via one of the unseen servants on your ship was more challenging... but not impossible."
traits.speaker: Karael

languages.text: "Er muss entschieden haben, dass ich Marazhais Fehler wiederholen und ihm vertrauen würde. Das habe ich nicht. Und zudem ist es noch gefährlicher, vor einem in Missgunst gefallenen Archonten zu buckeln, als eine gefallene Kabale wiederzubeleben. Es war leicht, vorzugeben, dass ich Nazrakheis Befehle ausführe. Er ist durch seine Zeit im Realraum merklich dümmer geworden. Mit über einen der unsichtbaren Diener auf Eurem Schiff mit Marazhai zu verschwören, war schwieriger ... aber nicht unmöglich."
languages.original_text: "He must have decided that I would repeat Marazhai's same mistake and trust him. I did not, and besides, grovelling before an Archon that has fallen into disfavour is even more dangerous than resurrecting a fallen Kabal. Pretending that I was carrying out Nazrakhei's orders was easy, he became noticeably more stupid after his time in realspace. Conspiring with Marazhai via one of the unseen servants on your ship was more challenging... but not impossible."

traits.locale_text: "Er muss entschieden haben, dass ich Marazhais Fehler wiederholen und ihm vertrauen würde. Das habe ich nicht. Und zudem ist es noch gefährlicher, vor einem in Missgunst gefallenen Archonten zu buckeln, als eine gefallene Kabale wiederzubeleben. Es war leicht, vorzugeben, dass ich Nazrakheis Befehle ausführe. Er ist durch seine Zeit im Realraum merklich dümmer geworden. Mit über einen der unsichtbaren Diener auf Eurem Schiff mit Marazhai zu verschwören, war schwieriger ... aber nicht unmöglich."
traits.speaker: Karael

languages.text: “他肯定以为我会重蹈玛拉斋的覆辙，选择相信他，但我并没有。而且，在失宠的执政官面前卑躬屈膝，这比复活陨落的阴谋团还要危险。我一直在假装执行纳札骸的命令，想骗过他非常简单，毕竟他在真实世界待了一段时间之后，明显变得比以前更蠢了。相比之前，通过你船上的某位仆人与玛拉斋进行密谋，这个任务更有挑战性……但也并非无法实现。”
languages.original_text: "He must have decided that I would repeat Marazhai's same mistake and trust him. I did not, and besides, grovelling before an Archon that has fallen into disfavour is even more dangerous than resurrecting a fallen Kabal. Pretending that I was carrying out Nazrakhei's orders was easy, he became noticeably more stupid after his time in realspace. Conspiring with Marazhai via one of the unseen servants on your ship was more challenging... but not impossible."

traits.locale_text: “他肯定以为我会重蹈玛拉斋的覆辙，选择相信他，但我并没有。而且，在失宠的执政官面前卑躬屈膝，这比复活陨落的阴谋团还要危险。我一直在假装执行纳札骸的命令，想骗过他非常简单，毕竟他在真实世界待了一段时间之后，明显变得比以前更蠢了。相比之前，通过你船上的某位仆人与玛拉斋进行密谋，这个任务更有挑战性……但也并非无法实现。”
traits.speaker: Karael

languages.text: « Il avait dû décider que je ferais la même erreur que Marazhai en lui faisant confiance. Il avait tort. S'incliner devant un archonte tombé en disgrâce est encore plus dangereux que ressusciter une Kabale déchue. Il n'était pas difficile de faire semblant d'exécuter les ordres de Nazrakhei, ses capacités intellectuelles avaient nettement régressé après son séjour dans l'espace réel. Conspirer avec Marazhai par le biais de l'un des serviteurs invisibles de votre vaisseau était difficile... mais pas impossible. »
languages.original_text: "He must have decided that I would repeat Marazhai's same mistake and trust him. I did not, and besides, grovelling before an Archon that has fallen into disfavour is even more dangerous than resurrecting a fallen Kabal. Pretending that I was carrying out Nazrakhei's orders was easy, he became noticeably more stupid after his time in realspace. Conspiring with Marazhai via one of the unseen servants on your ship was more challenging... but not impossible."

traits.locale_text: « Il avait dû décider que je ferais la même erreur que Marazhai en lui faisant confiance. Il avait tort. S'incliner devant un archonte tombé en disgrâce est encore plus dangereux que ressusciter une Kabale déchue. Il n'était pas difficile de faire semblant d'exécuter les ordres de Nazrakhei, ses capacités intellectuelles avaient nettement régressé après son séjour dans l'espace réel. Conspirer avec Marazhai par le biais de l'un des serviteurs invisibles de votre vaisseau était difficile... mais pas impossible. »
traits.speaker: Karael

languages.text: «Debe de haber supuesto que repetiría el error de Marazhai y confiaría en él. No lo hice. Además, arrastrarte ante un Arconte que ha perdido el favor es más peligroso aún que resucitar una Kábala caída. Fingir que ejecutaba los planes de Nazrakhei era fácil, su tiempo en el espacio real lo volvió mucho más inepto. Conspirar con Marazhai a través de uno de los sirvientes ocultos en tu nave fue un desafío mayor... pero no imposible».
languages.original_text: "He must have decided that I would repeat Marazhai's same mistake and trust him. I did not, and besides, grovelling before an Archon that has fallen into disfavour is even more dangerous than resurrecting a fallen Kabal. Pretending that I was carrying out Nazrakhei's orders was easy, he became noticeably more stupid after his time in realspace. Conspiring with Marazhai via one of the unseen servants on your ship was more challenging... but not impossible."

traits.locale_text: «Debe de haber supuesto que repetiría el error de Marazhai y confiaría en él. No lo hice. Además, arrastrarte ante un Arconte que ha perdido el favor es más peligroso aún que resucitar una Kábala caída. Fingir que ejecutaba los planes de Nazrakhei era fácil, su tiempo en el espacio real lo volvió mucho más inepto. Conspirar con Marazhai a través de uno de los sirvientes ocultos en tu nave fue un desafío mayor... pero no imposible».
traits.speaker: Karael

languages.text: 「私がマラズハイと同じ過ちを犯し、自分を信用するだろうと確信したに違いない。だがそうはならなかった。より一層嫌われていたアーコンに屈服するのは、敗北した陰謀団を復活させるよりも危険なことだ。ナズラクヘイの命令に従っているふりをすることは簡単だった。彼はリアルスペースで過ごした後、著しいほど愚かになったから。お前の船に潜んでいる手下を通してマラズハイと共謀することの方がよっぽど難しかった…だが不可能ではなかった」
languages.original_text: "He must have decided that I would repeat Marazhai's same mistake and trust him. I did not, and besides, grovelling before an Archon that has fallen into disfavour is even more dangerous than resurrecting a fallen Kabal. Pretending that I was carrying out Nazrakhei's orders was easy, he became noticeably more stupid after his time in realspace. Conspiring with Marazhai via one of the unseen servants on your ship was more challenging... but not impossible."

traits.locale_text: 「私がマラズハイと同じ過ちを犯し、自分を信用するだろうと確信したに違いない。だがそうはならなかった。より一層嫌われていたアーコンに屈服するのは、敗北した陰謀団を復活させるよりも危険なことだ。ナズラクヘイの命令に従っているふりをすることは簡単だった。彼はリアルスペースで過ごした後、著しいほど愚かになったから。お前の船に潜んでいる手下を通してマラズハイと共謀することの方がよっぽど難しかった…だが不可能ではなかった」
traits.speaker: Karael

languages.text: "Marazhai'ın yaptığı hatayı tekrar edeceğimi ve ona güveneceğimi düşünmüş olmalı. Bense öyle yapmadım. Gözden düşmüş bir Arkon'un önünde eğilmek, parçalanmış bir Kabal'ı yeniden hayata döndürmekten bile daha tehlikelidir. Nazrakhei'in emirlerini yerine getiriyormuş gibi yapmak kolaydı, gerçekuzayda aptallaştığı barizdi. Asıl zor olan, gemindeki görülmeyen hizmetkârların birini kullanarak Marazhai'la komplo planlamaktı. Zor ama mümkündü."
languages.original_text: "He must have decided that I would repeat Marazhai's same mistake and trust him. I did not, and besides, grovelling before an Archon that has fallen into disfavour is even more dangerous than resurrecting a fallen Kabal. Pretending that I was carrying out Nazrakhei's orders was easy, he became noticeably more stupid after his time in realspace. Conspiring with Marazhai via one of the unseen servants on your ship was more challenging... but not impossible."

traits.locale_text: "Marazhai'ın yaptığı hatayı tekrar edeceğimi ve ona güveneceğimi düşünmüş olmalı. Öyle yapmadım, ki gözden düşmüş bir Arkon'un önünde eğilmek, parçalanmış bir Kabal'ı yeniden hayata döndürmekten bile daha tehlikelidir. Nazrakhei'in emirlerini yerine getiriyormuş gibi yapmak kolaydı, gerçekuzayda bariz bir şekilde aptallaşmıştı. Asıl zor olan, gemindeki görülmeyen hizmetkârların birini kullanarak Marazhai'la komplo planlamaktı ama imkânsız değildi."
traits.speaker: Karael
